title: FreightShipmentDocumentsRequest
description: Retrieve the freight documents associated with a PRO Number. By default this request will return all available document types. You can optionally specify a `document_type` value in order to download a particular kind of document.

scac.description: The Standard Carrier Alpha Code developed by the NMFTA is used to identify a freight carrier within the transportation industry.

auth.description: The carrier authorization information needed to fulfill this request.

access_token.description: Optional freight account access token as required per freight carrier. Tokens are issued via the Provision Freight Account operation.
